DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate how many patients require the addition of the obturator nerve block in the recovery room after the total knee surgery. Also to study the efficacy of blocking the obturator nerve in controlling their knee pain.
DOC.brief_title: Obturator Nerve Block With Femoral and Sciatic Block
DOC.criteria: total knee replacement Hisory of neurologica disease, diabetes, pregnancy, neuropathy
